Text: Omi chʼoli achiwebe̩te̩ma e-ogbolo, Ata-mi la chʼaluche̩-wñ.
E̩to̩ du ef umi ki ma nʼe̩ro n, i adʼalo, e-du ki la arʼe̩ro i año̩ todu kʼi rʼe̩ro tule.
Ame̩ chʼabo ki chʼe̩ño̩ me̩, lef o̩la kʼu ka ñwu me̩ le̩. Me̩ nagugu efu mi waa, omi la dʼefu me̩.
Alu kʼe̩to̩ ma neke rʼe̩ro kpai ojikʼo̩la-wñ n, chai e̩gba kʼi kad achiwebe̩te̩ma, abe̩le̩ ame̩ la aro n, chai e̩gba ku me̩ gugu efu mi.
Omi chʼoli achiwebe̩te̩ma le̩, ame̩ chʼe̩to̩-wñ; e̩ne̩ ki gugu efu mi kʼomi la gugu efu wñ, e̩ne̩ le̩ arʼe̩ro nana; todabu ku me̩ ma neke che e̩wñ du ubi mi ojoji n.
Iche̩wñ kʼone̩ ma gugu efu mi n, ma dʼu ro̩ tʼo̩do̩da dab e̩to̩ oli, tak i agbe̩; taku ma mʼu yajo̩, oñ ma ko rikpolo nyʼef una, tak i jo.
Iche̩wñ ku me̩ gugu efu mi, kʼo̩la alu-mi la gugu efu me̩, e̩wñ du ki dʼume̩ e̩do̩ me̩ nabi, oñ i amud e-me̩.
Ef e-kide̩ oñ Ata-mi nʼojima, todu ku me̩ ki rʼe̩ro nana, ku me̩ la mud amako̩che̩-mi.
Alu kʼAta fe̩do̩ mi, abe̩le̩ omi ño̩ fe̩do̩ me̩; me̩ nagugu ef ufe̩do̩ e-mi waa.
Iche̩wñ ku me̩ dejutʼo̩la uko̩-mi ame̩ agugu ef ufe̩do̩-mi: alu kʼomi dejutʼo̩la uko̩ Ata-mi le̩, kʼu la gugu ef ufe̩do̩-wñ.
U kʼo̩la e̩wñ kide̩ ñwu me̩ todu kʼuyo̩-mi ki nadʼef ume̩, kʼuyo̩ e-me̩ le̩ ki la nyo̩ kpa.
O̩la-uko̩ e-mi le̩ de̩ kakini, Todu kʼame̩ ki fe̩do̩ omune̩ alu kʼu fe̩do̩ me̩.
Ufe̩do̩ ki tʼe-le̩ le e̩ne̩ du ne̩ n, owñ chʼutodu kʼone̩ ki mʼoji o̩la-wñ du tinyo̩ tod amonuku-wñ.
Ame̩ chʼamonuku-mi, iche̩wñ ku me̩ chʼe̩wñ kʼomi tuko̩ ñwu me̩.
U ñʼado̩ me̩ kʼadu ge̩ n; todabu kʼadu ma ma e̩wñ kʼodu-wñ ache n; u la do̩ me̩ ko̩ amonuku, todabu kʼu je̩ ñwu me̩ ma e̩wñ du kʼu gbo̩ ugbo Ata-mi.
I chʼame̩ chi mi n, chai omi chi me̩, u la ko me̩ jo̩ todu ku me̩ lo ku me̩ rʼe̩ro, kʼe̩ro-me̩ le̩ ki kpo̩kpe̩; todu kʼe̩wñ du ku me̩ bi Ata ef odu-mi, kʼi nadu ñwu me̩.
Uko̩ e̩wñ kide̩ nate̩ ñwu me̩ todu ku me̩ ki fe̩do̩ omune̩.
Iche̩wñ kʼile̩-i achulaka me̩, me̩ ma ka kʼulaka e-mi oñ i che o̩gba e-me̩.
E̩te̩-me̩ ma chʼile̩-i, ile̩ ma che̩do̩ e̩wñ e-wñ; todabu kʼe̩te̩-me̩ ma chʼile̩-i n, ama omi chi me̩ kwef ile̩-i, lef e-kide̩ oñ ile̩-i achulaka me̩.
Me̩ nadibekadʼo̩la kʼomi ka ñwu me̩ kakini, Adu tʼodu-wñ le n. Iche̩wñ ku ma doli mi, maku ma ñʼadoli me̩ ge̩; iche̩wñ ku ma dejutʼo̩la-mi, maku ma ñʼadejutʼe-me̩ ge̩.
Ma muda che me̩ e̩wñ kide̩ du tod odu-mi, todabu ku ma ma ma e̩ne̩ ki kpe̩ mi wa n.
Iche̩wñ kʼu ma wa ko̩la ñwu ma n, ma ma nʼadure n; fa-i ma la nʼugbo du ku ma chukpa tod adure-ma ge̩ n.
E̩ne̩ ki achulaka mi achulaka Ata-mi kpo̩fo̩.
I ma chʼabu kʼu chʼuko̩lo̩ efu ma e-kʼe̩ne̩ omune̩ ma che n, ma ma nʼadure n: fa-i ma la li, ma la chulaka mi kpʼAta-mi.
Ama e-le̩ chʼutodu kʼo̩la e-ki che̩ko̩tane̩ ef o̩lo̩da-ma ki che̩kpa kakini, Ma chulaka mi echichi ofofo.
Ama e̩gba du kʼE̩nugbe̩do̩ le̩ lewa, owñ chʼe-kʼu nakpe̩ kwʼugbo Ata wʼugbo me̩, Afu e-ochochi e-ki akwʼugbo Ata dufu, e̩ne̩ le̩ agba mi ibenu.
Ame̩ la ñʼagba ibenu ge̩, todabu ku me̩ jʼugbo mi kwʼabakwane̩.
